objectives: Students will discuss education and learning using Formal/Business register language
Students will engage with Drama themed scenarios related to education and learning
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of formal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining education and learning content with Drama narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore education and learning through a Drama lens using Formal/Business language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a dramatic conflict or emotional crisis involving education and learning

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice formal register vocabulary related to education and learning in a drama context
Students engage in drama themed role-play about education and learning using formal register
Students create original drama themed content about education and learning in formal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe education and learning in a Drama scenario?
What conflict or tension might be involved in education and learning?
Can you create a Drama story about education and learning?
How does education and learning change when viewed through a Drama perspective?
What formal register expressions would you use to discuss this drama scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Drama situation involving education and learning
roles: Character A: Using formal register in drama context
Character B: Responding in formal register within drama theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Formal/Business throughout: Professional, business-appropriate language
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Drama theme: Intense emotions, conflicts, life challenges

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Formal/Business register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Drama themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of formal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
